library_timing: The library is open from 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM from Monday to Saturday. On Sundays, it operates from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
membership_info: To become a member, visit the library reception with a valid ID. Students and faculty can register for free, while external members must pay an annual fee of Rs. 50.
book_search: You can search for books using our online catalog at https://library.example.com. Alternatively, ask the librarian for assistance.
borrowing_rules: Students can borrow up to 5 books for 14 days. Faculty members can borrow 10 books for 30 days. A fine of Rs. 1.0 per day applies for overdue books.
return_policy: Books should be returned on or before the due date. Late returns will incur a fine of Rs. 3.0 per day per book.
digital_resources: The library offers access to e-books, research papers, and online journals through our digital portal at https://library.example.com/digital.
events_and_workshops: We host weekly book clubs, author talks, and research workshops. Check our event calendar at https://library.example.com/events.
contact_info: You can contact the library at (123) 456-7890 or email us at library@university.edu.
